panels.description: Shows rate of requests against /query for the given time.

targets.expr: sum by (job, handler, code) (rate(http_requests_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", handler="query"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests against /query.

targets.expr: sum by (job, code) (rate(http_requests_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", handler="query",code=~"5.."}[$interval])) / ignoring (code) group_left() sum by (job) (rate(http_requests_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", handler="query"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests in quantiles.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (job, le) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", handler="query"}[$interval]))) * 1
histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (job, le) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", handler="query"}[$interval]))) * 1
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", handler="query"}[$interval]))) * 1

panels.title: Duration

panels.description: Shows rate of requests against /query_range for the given time range.

targets.expr: sum by (job, handler, code) (rate(http_requests_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", handler="query_range"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests against /query_range.

targets.expr: sum by (job, code) (rate(http_requests_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", handler="query_range",code=~"5.."}[$interval])) / ignoring (code) group_left() sum by (job) (rate(http_requests_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", handler="query_range"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests in quantiles.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (job, le) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", handler="query_range"}[$interval]))) * 1
histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (job, le) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", handler="query_range"}[$interval]))) * 1
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", handler="query_range"}[$interval]))) * 1

panels.title: Duration

panels.description: Shows rate of handled Unary gRPC requests from other queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job, grpc_method, grpc_code) (rate(grpc_client_handled_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests from other queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job, grpc_code) (rate(grpc_client_handled_total{grpc_code=~"Unknown|ResourceExhausted|Internal|Unavailable|DataLoss",cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval])) / ignoring (grpc_code) group_left() sum by (job) (rate(grpc_client_handled_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests from other queriers, in quantiles.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_client_handling_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval]))) * 1
histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_client_handling_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval]))) * 1
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_client_handling_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval]))) * 1

panels.title: Duration

panels.description: Shows rate of handled Streamed gRPC requests from other queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job, grpc_method, grpc_code) (rate(grpc_client_handled_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests from other queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job, grpc_code) (rate(grpc_client_handled_total{grpc_code=~"Unknown|ResourceExhausted|Internal|Unavailable|DataLoss",cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval])) / ignoring (grpc_code) group_left() sum by (job) (rate(grpc_client_handled_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests from other queriers, in quantiles

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_client_handling_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval]))) * 1
histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_client_handling_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval]))) * 1
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_client_handling_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval]))) * 1

panels.title: Duration

panels.description: Shows rate of DNS lookups to discover stores.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(thanos_query_store_apis_dns_lookups_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of failures compared to the total number of executed DNS lookups.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(thanos_query_store_apis_dns_failures_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$interval])) / sum by (job) (rate(thanos_query_store_apis_dns_lookups_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows available capacity of processing queries in parallel.

targets.expr: max_over_time(thanos_query_concurrent_gate_queries_max{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]) - avg_over_time(thanos_query_concurrent_gate_queries_in_flight{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval])

panels.title: Concurrent Capacity

targets.expr: go_memstats_alloc_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}
go_memstats_heap_alloc_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}
rate(go_memstats_alloc_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[30s])
rate(go_memstats_heap_alloc_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[30s])
go_memstats_stack_inuse_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}
go_memstats_heap_inuse_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}
go_goroutines{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}
go_gc_duration_seconds{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}
